about_the_game:
This includes:
The raw images of the 16 collectable postcards in game.


Right click the product in your Steam Library and select "Properties".
Under the "Local Files" tab, select “Browse Local Files”.
Within the product's local files, locate a folder that has a similar name to the content you are searching for.
detailed_description:
This includes:
The raw images of the 16 collectable postcards in game.


Right click the product in your Steam Library and select "Properties".
Under the "Local Files" tab, select “Browse Local Files”.
Within the product's local files, locate a folder that has a similar name to the content you are searching for.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
